description.displayText:
English:
My son loves spending time with her, especially outdoors, where they enjoy recreational activities together. Evelin also fosters creativity through age-appropriate games and activities, such as painting and exploring new skills. Her patience, creativity, and kindness are truly remarkable.
I'm very grateful for the love and care Evelin has given to my son. She is undoubtedly an excellent choice for any family looking for someone responsible, loving, and dedicated.

Spanish: 
Mi hijo ama pasar tiempo con ella, especialmente al aire libre, donde disfrutan juntos de actividades recreativas. Además, Evelin fomenta la creatividad a través de juegos y actividades adaptados a su edad, como pintar y explorar nuevas habilidades. Su paciencia, creatividad y calidez son admirables.
Estoy muy agradecida por el amor y cuidado que Evelin le ha brindado a mi hijo. Sin duda, es una excelente opción para cualquier familia que busque a alguien responsable, cariñosa y dedicada.

description.displayText: Evelyn has been an incredible addition to our family, providing both warmth and structure to our children's daily routines. She is consistently attentive, nurturing, and patient, always engaging our kids with creative activities while ensuring their safety and well-being. Her excellent communication skills and reliability make her an invaluable part of our household. Our children adore her, and we appreciate how she fosters a loving and educational environment, encouraging curiosity and growth. We couldn't be more grateful for the positive impact she has made on our family.

We couldn't be more grateful for the positive impact she has made on our family.

description.displayText: Evelyn es una excelente cuidadora muy amable respetuosa y muy carismatica , tiene un buen ambiente laboral y una buena comunicación la recomiendo mucho
